Title: Tape 6, Side A
Writer: Diana Son (teleplay by), Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by), Nic Sheff (story editor)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Clay and Hannah grow closer. While Clay spends a heartbreaking night listening to his tape with Tony, tensions boil over at Bryce's house.
